A dimension key in the fact table with no corresponding dimension table
The structure or blueprint of a database including tables, columns, and relationships
A dimensional model with a central fact table connected to dimension tables
A dimensional model where dimension tables are normalized
A table containing measurable business facts and foreign keys to dimensions
A table containing descriptive attributes for analysis

q: What is the main difference between star and snowflake schemas?
o: Star schema has denormalized dimensions, snowflake has normalized dimensions

q: Which schema typically has better query performance?
o: Star schema due to fewer joins
